SEARCH
Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.game.components

Class NormalCard

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.game.components.NormalCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
CardInterface, JsonConvertable, PlayableCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldenCard, StarterCard
public class NormalCard extends Object implements PlayableCard
Represents a normal card in the game with suit, corners, face state, and points.

  • Constructor Details

    • NormalCard

      public NormalCard(String id) throws SyntaxException
      Construct a NormalCard from the information encoded in the given String with the following syntax: char 0-3 : represent the card's corners. Must be parsable into Symbol char 4 : represents the card's Suit and must be parsable as such char 5 : represents the card's visible face ('F': front, 'B': back) char 6 : represents the card's points. Must be parsable into an int between 0 and 9
      Parameters:
      id - a String containing the encoded information that identify the card
      Throws:
      SyntaxException - if the information are not correctly encoded or missing

    • equals

      public boolean equals(PlayableCard other)
      Checks if this NormalCard is equal to another PlayableCard. The cards are considered equal if their string representations, with 'B' replaced by 'F', are the same.
      Specified by:
      equals in interface PlayableCard
      Parameters:
      other - the other PlayableCard to compare with
      Returns:
      true if the cards are equal, false otherwise
